document.docAuthor: Pérez-Benavides, A. Lucía, Hernández-Baz, Fernando, González, Jorge M. & Riverón, Alejandro Zaldívar
document.masterDocTitle: Updated taxonomic checklist of Chalcidoidea (Hymenoptera) associated with Bruchinae (Coleoptera: Chrysomelidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Updated taxonomic checklist of Chalcidoidea (Hymenoptera) associated with Bruchinae (Coleoptera: Chrysomelidae)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Hosts.
Abutiloneus idoneus Bridwell
on
Abutilon californicum Benth. ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )
*;
Acanthoscelides anoditus Johnson
on
Anoda cristata
(L.) Schleecht ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )*;
Acanthoscelides brevipes (Sharp)
on
Sida rhombifolia
L. ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )*;
Acanthoscelides chiricahuae (Fall)
on
Mimosa aculeaticarpa Ortega
, and
Mimosa dysocarpa A.Gray ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )
*;
Acanthoscelides compressicornis (Schaeffer)
on
Desmanthus virgatus
(L.) Willd. ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )*;
Acanthoscelides cordifer
on
Mimosa albida Willd.
, and
Mimosa vellosiella Herter ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )
*;
Acanthoscelides cornis Johnson
on
Heliocarpus palmeri S.Watson ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )
*;
Acanthoscelides cuernavaca Johnson
on
Desmodium orbiculare Schltdl. ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )
*;
Acanthoscelides desmanthi Johnson
on
Desmanthus virgatus
(L.) Willd. ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )*;
Acanthoscelides desmodicola Johnson
on
Desmodium tortuosum (Sw.)
DC. ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )*;
Acanthoscelides difficilis (Sharp)
on
Mimosa albida Willd.
, and
Mimosa pigra
L. ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )*;
Acanthoscelides johnsoni Kingsolver
on
Triumfetta calderonii Standl.
, and
Triumfetta lappula
L. ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )*;
Acanthoscelides longistilus (Horn)
from seed of
Lespedeza
sp. [
L. intermedia (S.Watson) Britton
or
L. virginica
(L.)] Britton*, and from seed of
Lespedeza hirta subsp. curtissii Clewell
* (Bissel 1940);
Acanthoscelides pertinax (Sharp)
on
Aeschynomene americana
L.,
Dalea leporina (Aiton) Bullock
,
Marina aff. nutans (Cav.) Barneby
and
Tephrosia vicioides Schltdl. ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )
*;
Acanthoscelides piceoapicalis (Pic)
on
Mimosa somnians Willd. ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )
*;
Acanthoscelides puelliopsis Johnson
on
Desmodium incanum
DC. ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )*;
Acanthoscelides puellus (Sharp)
on
Calopogonium mucunoides Desv. ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )
*;
Acanthoscelides pusillimus (Sharp)
on
Dalea leporina (Aiton) Bullock
, and
Dalea tomentosa (Cav.) Willd. ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )
*;
Acanthoscelides quadridentatus (Schaeffer)
on
Mimosa pigra
L. ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )*;
Acanthoscelides rufovittatus (Schaeffer)
on
Tephrosia cana Brandegee
,
Tephrosia ultifolia Rose
,
Tephrosia rhodantha Brandegee
, ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )*;
Acanthoscelides sanblas Johnson
on
Triumfetta calderonii Standl. ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )
*;
Acanthoscelides schubertae Johnson
on
Desmodium incanum
DC. ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )*;
Acanthoscelides sleeperi Johnson
on
Abutilon palmeri A. Gray ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )
*;
Acanthoscelides subaequalis Johnson
on
Abutilon californicum Benth.
,
Abutilon incanum (Link) Sweet
,
Abutilon trisulcatum (Jacq.) Urban. ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )
*;
Acanthoscelides submuticus (Sharp) ( Pierce 1908 )
from
Amorpha fruticosa
L.* ( Cushman 1911 );
Acanthoscelides taboga Johnson
on
Calopogonium mucunoides Desv. ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )
*;
Acanthoscelides tepic Johnson
on
Hochreutinera amplexifolia
(DC.) Fryxell ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )*;
Acanthoscelides triumfettae Kingsolver
on
Triumfetta calderonii Standl.
, and
Triumfetta lappula
L. ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )*;
Bruchus brachialis Fahraeus
on
Vicia villosa Roth
* ( Bridwell & Bottimer 1933 );
Meibomeus
sp. on
Aeschynomene americana
L. ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )*;
Merobruchus
sp. on
Acacia angustissima (Mill.) Kuntze
, and
Chloroleucon mangense (Jacq.) Britton & Rose ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )
*;
Mimosestes acaciestes Kingsolver & Johnson
on
Acacia constricta A.Gray ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )
*;
Mimosestes amicus (Horn)
on
Acacia constricta A.Gray ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )
*;
Sennius auricomus Johnson & Kingsolver
on
Senna pallida (Vahl) H.S.Irwin & Barneby ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )
*;
Sennius fallax (Boheman)
on
Senna occidentalis
(L.) Link ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )*;
Sennius instabilis (Sharp)
on
Senna hirsuta var. leptocarpa (Benth.) H.S.Irwin & Barneby ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )
*;
Sennius lebasi (Fahraeus)
on
Senna hirsuta var. leptocarpa (Benth.) H.S.Irwin & Barneby
,
Senna hirsuta var. hirta H.S.Irwin & Barneby
,
Senna occidentalis
(L.) Link ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )*;
Sennius morosus (Sharp)
on
Senna hirsuta var. leptocarpa (Benth.) H.S.Irwin & Barneby
, and
Senna hirsuta var. hirta H.S.Irwin & Barneby ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )
*;
Sennius rufomaculatus (Motschulsky)
on
Senna hirsuta var. hirta H.S.Irwin & Barneby
,
Senna occidentalis
(L.) Link ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )*;
Stator pruininus (Horn)
on
Acacia constricta A.Gray ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )
*.

Distribution. NEARCTIC: United States of America . NEOTROPICAL: Antilles, Brazil , Caribbean (including West Indies), Colombia *, Costa Rica , Guatemala *, Honduras *, Mexico , Panama * ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 ).
